summary: Completed comprehensive testing of tax configuration feature. Backend APIs working correctly with proper tax calculations (10% when enabled, 0% when disabled). Frontend Settings page and Sales page integration working properly. Admin access controls functioning as expected.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for successful sale creation

resolved_issues.issue: Tax settings were pre-configured from previous tests

passed_tests: Tax calculations in sales (10% when enabled, 0% when disabled)
Settings page loads and displays correctly
Tax rate input properly disabled/enabled based on toggle
Sales page shows dynamic tax rate (0% when disabled)
Cart calculations reflect tax settings correctly

success_percentage.backend: 84.2% (16/19 tests passed - minor status code issues only)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all tax configuration UI elements working correctly)
